body.p:
To His Excellency
Thos E Bramlett
Govenor of Ky

We would respectfully represent that our friend neighbor and County man William Oldham was the security of his son Lewis C Oldham for his appearance to the Oct Term 1865 of the Grant Circuit Court to answer an Indictment theretofore returned to said Court for an alledged felony committed by sd Lewis C Oldham whilst acting in the Capacity of a Soldier for the sum of four hundred Dollars Lewis C Oldham did not appear and the sd Bond was forfeited Mr Oldham is a clever Gentleman a poor man with seven or eight Small children & to pay said Bond will reduce him & his wife & family to actual want and suffer and has son has left the County and gone west and is out of the control and reach of his father In view of these facts we would ask most respectuflly your Excellency to interfere and cancel the Bond before judgt --

J. F. Sheriff
